mapper.select: select id, name, identity, type, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remark, need_modify from electricity.t_ele_auth_entry where id = #{id}
select id, name, identity, type, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remark, need_modify from electricity.t_ele_auth_entry limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_ele_auth_entry(name, identity, type, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remark, need_modify) values (#{name}, #{identity}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remark}, #{needModify})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_ele_auth_entry
name = #{name},
identity = #{identity},
type = #{type},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remark = #{remark},
need_modify = #{needModify},
where id = #{id}
